title: B1: Define credibility schema for ERC-8004

title: D5: Write 'How disputes work' guide
description: Create comprehensive guide explaining: dispute lifecycle, deterministic vs optimistic, counter-bond windows, arbitration, slashing distribution. User-friendly with diagrams.

title: A10: Fix IRSB-SEC-010 (min slash in DisputeModule)
description: MEDIUM: Add min slash validation in DisputeModule.sol:160-164. If slashAmount=0, treat as no-fault rather than meaningless punishment.
close_reason: Fixed: Added zero-slash check at DisputeModule.sol:166-169. If slashAmount rounds to 0, sets solverFault=false to avoid meaningless punishment. Added test_IRSB_SEC_010_zeroSlashTreatedAsNoFault. All 326 tests pass.

close_reason: FOUNDRY_PROFILE: ci was already configured at env level (line 10), enabling 10k fuzz runs. No changes needed.

close_reason: Added coverage threshold check (80%) after forge coverage step in CI. Fails if line coverage < 80%.

title: B4: Implement ERC-8004 publishing on slash
description: ERC8004Adapter should publish negative reputation signals when solver is slashed. Add hook in SolverRegistry.slash() to call adapter if configured.

title: A13: Fix failing SR1 invariant test
description: Fix SolverRegistryInvariants.invariant_SR1_bondAccountingNeverExceedsBalance. Currently failing - 1 test failure in suite. Critical for CI gate.
close_reason: Fixed handler to use deterministic counter for unique operator addresses instead of bounded random seeds. All 4 invariant tests pass (256 runs each, 512k total calls). Full suite: 325 tests passing.

title: Add challenger bond for griefing protection
description: Implement challenger bond requirement (10-25% of dispute value) to prevent malicious actors from locking solver bonds indefinitely via frivolous disputes. This is a critical security fix identified in the feasibility assessment.
close_reason: Implemented challenger bond requirement: 10% bond to open dispute, refund+reward on success, forfeit on failure. 67 tests passing. Commit 2bfc045

description: HIGH: Add validation in SolverRegistry.slash() to revert on zero amount. Prevents silent failure on small bonds.
close_reason: Already fixed. Test passes: test_IRSB_SEC_005_zeroSlashAmountReverts. Code at SolverRegistry.sol:254-255 reverts on zero amount.

title: B3: Implement ERC-8004 publishing on finalize

description: HIGH: Change failed dispute to Finalized (not Pending) in IntentReceiptHub.sol:276. Prevents unlimited re-challenges on rejected disputes.
close_reason: Already fixed. Test passes: test_IRSB_SEC_003_rejectedDisputeCannotBeRechallenged. Code at IntentReceiptHub.sol:278-292 sets status to Finalized instead of Pending.

title: D1: Implement irsb verify CLI/SDK function
description: Implement 'irsb verify <receiptId>' in SDK. Prints: status (posted/disputed/finalized/slashed), tx hashes, evidence pointer hashes/CIDs. Privacy-safe (no sensitive payloads).

title: Implement reputation decay
description: Add time-weighted decay to IntentScore metrics so stale solvers don't retain old reputation scores indefinitely. Scores should decay over time if the solver is inactive.
close_reason: Implemented 30-day half-life decay with 10% floor. 74 tests passing. PR #2 created.

close_reason: Complete: 21 tests passing, all dispute flows (evidence, escalation, arbitration, timeout resolution) implemented and verified. 95/95 tests pass across full suite.
